DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study was to assess the near-term (12 months) efficacy of pulmonary vein isolation using a standard approach compared to application of an additional acute procedural endpoint of unexcitability along the ablation line.
DOC.brief_title: Unexcitability Along the Ablation as an Endpoint for Atrial Fibrillation Ablation
DOC.criteria: written informed consent age > 18 years paroxysmal atrial fibrillation structural heart disease intracardiac thrombus reversible causes of atrial fibrillation inability to take warfarin
